entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a CanApplyChanges api to CodeFixContext and CodeRefactoringContext #63457
  • Rename doesn't work on the properties associated with positional parameters/primary constructor parameters in records #63455
  • EditorConfig Template description should be updated from `default` to `empty` #63452
  • Remove Newtonsoft.Json package reference from eng/InternalTools.props #63450
  • Assert failure in Binder.CheckValue() compiling discarded ref assignment #63446
  • `IDE0055` diagnostic reported for pattern with opening parenthesis followed by relational operator #63445
  • IDE0045 produce invalid code #63441
  • Deprecate all public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #63440

Closed

  • MethodNotFoundException when running RoslynDeployment on main #63258
    Backlog
  • Convert to 'Program.Main' should preserve staticness of Program class #62943
    17.4
  • Convert to 'Program.Main' with `file partial class Program` #62437
    Backlog
  • MoveTypeCodeRefactoringProvider when trying to move struct from interface to separate cs file #63114
    17.4
  • `CSharpSyntaxGenerator.AsInterfaceMember` fails for nested types in interfaces #60708
    Backlog
  • UTF8 multiline raw string literals don't show left column guide in the IDE #63428
  • Using Source Generator occurs a weird building error #63418
  • Dereference of ref field should be emitted to IL even if value is ignored #62122
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify File-Rename code #63456
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused argument #63454
    Area-IDE
  • Inline local in Program.Main refactoring #63451
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve cross-project add-using results #63449
    Area-IDE
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Do symbol mapping in Go To Def #63439
    Area-IDE
  • Move symbol-cache incremental-analyzer out of oop. #63438
    Area-IDE
  • Add assert back #63437
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle nested non-deconstruction conversions in DeconstructionInfo #63435
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fetch the recoverable tree length option more lazily #63155
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable adding attributes to generic types #63292
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use existing Program class declaration in "Convert to 'Program.Main'" refactoring when possible #63276
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix moving nested type to another file from an interface #63274
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enable UTF8 raw multiline column guides #63443
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure all ref local and field value access are dereferenced #63432
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Update CodeAnalysis.Testing dependency #63416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
